Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 89th overall pick, by Toledo in 1965...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1972, off Guillermo Mejia (NJ)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1973, off Mark Almaraz (DIA)...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Diablo on 5/4/1975...
Injured on 6/21/1979 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/14/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $1,713,500 per year...
